meanings.definition: To cause physical pain or injury to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Running into the wall really hurting my head.
meanings.sent2: The bee sting is hurting a lot.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy cat keeps hurting its tail on the furniture.
meanings.sent4: The sharp words from her hurtful comments are hurting me deeply.
meanings.sent5: The burning sensation from the hot stove is truly hurting.

meanings.definition: To feel emotional pain or distress.
meanings.sent1: Seeing him cry is really hurting my heart.
meanings.sent2: She is hurting inside after the breakup.
meanings.sent3: The sad movie is hurting my feelings too much.
meanings.sent4: The loss of her pet is hurting her soul.
meanings.sent5: The loneliness is hurting her spirit every day.

meanings.sent1: The hurting wound needed immediate attention.
meanings.sent3: The hurting puppy looked up with big sad eyes.
meanings.sent4: The hurting sound of the alarm filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The hurting news brought tears to her eyes.
